Caution!
■Frozen sausage patties could
be contaminated with bacteria
because they are not completely
cooked.

Changing Settings
■You can adjust the settings
on the front grill panel.

Washed Your Hands?
■Use McDonald's
hand soap. Wash
properly. Dry with
a paper towel.

Stock Checking
■Determine how much
stock you need by
using the UHC chart.
